actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Indian Education Act and certain other related education assistance programs to provide Federal financial assistance to Hawaiian Natives.

summary.text: Hawaiian Native Educational Assistance Act - Amends the Indian Education Act and certain other related education assistance programs to provide Federal financial assistance to individuals, any of whose ancestors were natives of the Hawaiian Islands prior to 1778.

titles.title: Indian and Native Hawaiian Elementary and Secondary School Assistance Act
A bill to amend the Indian Education Act and certain other related education assistance programs to provide Federal financial assistance to Hawaiian Natives.
